Yea, NTRs on the cover but the actual content inside is not NTR at all. Its a basic story of karma. Bully had a crush on Kaede (who is SINGLE), and made Kazuta confess to her as punishment,  as shes known to be a delinquent. 

She accepts, her and Kazuta begin dating. They're a literal couple and as told by bullies, Kazuta gets them proof. One of the bullies is salty that he lost his shot at her, but going from chapter 2, Kaede and Kazuta are happy, even moreso than at the end of ch.1.  


Having your crush fall for someone else is NOT ntr in the slightest  just because you start whining about it. Thate just being petty. Feutakishis only showing their sexlife but not their relationship on a daily basis, but as you can see in both chapters, theyre indeed in love and Kaede is happy to be with him.

"A boy buys a married woman" was the closest to NTR hes gotten, but that ended on a happy, yet kinda sad note.  Hes one hell of an artist , but in that genre he falls short.

An easy tip for inexperienced ntr readers. Never care about the main character! If you want to place yourself in the story, always become the guy taking the girl away since you are so badass anyway lol. If you put focus on the main guy, you will get jealousy feedback emotionally. Big mistake in ntr. Fuck the main guy, you are the guy who is stealing the girl. This story is light ntr. You feel no connection to the bully so it barely comes off as ntr. Take this and apply it to all ntr. Main character is pussy and you are the badass homewrecker God lol.
